actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, so as to grant a priority in the trial or other disposition of any case involving a violation of the laws of the United States relating to narcotic drugs, marijuana, or depressant or stimulant substances.

summary.text: Grants a priority in the trial or other disposition of any case involving a violation of the laws of the United States relating to narcotic drugs, marihuana, or depressant or stimulant substances. (Adds 28 U.S.C. 335)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, so as to grant a priority in the trial or other disposition of any case involving a violation of the laws of the United States relating to narcotic drugs, marijuana, or depressant or stimulant substances.
